title: Techniques and software relevant to the coupling of continuum (fluid) and particle models of plasma for NEPTUNE
summary: The aim of the ‘Fusion Modelling’ use case within ExCALIBUR is to develop new algorithms, software and related infrastructure for efficient use of current Petascale and future Exascale supercomputing hardware. The report focuses on coupling together different approaches for fluid and particle-based simulations in plasma regions.
